00023 #ifndef H_SPK_ROTATOR
00024 #define H_SPK_ROTATOR
00025 
00026 #include "Core/SPK_Modifier.h"
00027 
00028 
00029 namespace SPK
00030 {
00043             class Rotator : public Modifier
00044             {
00045                         SPK_IMPLEMENT_REGISTERABLE(Rotator)
00046 
00047             public :
00048 
00050                         // Constructor //
00052 
00054                         Rotator();
00055 
00060                         static Rotator* create();
00061 
00062             private :
00063 
00064                         virtual void modify(Particle& particle,float deltaTime) const;
00065             };
00066 
00067 
00068             inline Rotator::Rotator() : Modifier(ALWAYS | INSIDE_ZONE | OUTSIDE_ZONE) {}
00069 
00070             inline Rotator* Rotator::create()
00071             {
00072                         Rotator* obj = new Rotator;
00073                         registerObject(obj);
00074                         return obj;
00075             }
00076 
00077             inline void Rotator::modify(Particle& particle,float deltaTime) const
00078             {
00079                         float angle = particle.getParamCurrentValue(PARAM_ANGLE) + deltaTime * particle.getParamCurrentValue(PARAM_ROTATION_SPEED);
00080                         particle.setParamCurrentValue(PARAM_ANGLE,angle);
00081             }
00082 }
00083 
00084 #endif
